dmca.title: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Psychic - welcome to Tarot Card Reading Made Easy]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, March 19, 2006 7:41 PM
To: seepsychicrose@yahoo.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Psychic - welcome to Tarot Card Reading Made
Easy]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Psychic - welcome to Tarot Card Reading Made Easy
Date: Sun, 19 Mar 2006 00:26:34 -0800 (PST)
From: Psychic "RoseR" <seepsychicrose@yahoo.com>
To: Phil Forbes <knowledgeabout@gmail.com>
CC: abuse@godaddy.com

You are hiding under www.knowledgeabout.com/tarot

When you are really www.www.EasyTarotReading.com

I may file a Federal court complaint because you are trying to make money
without my permission on my trademark name.  I am going to speak to my
Lawyer in regards to damages and attorney fees.



    Sponsored Links

Psychic and Tarot Reading
Learn To Read Tarot Cards In Less
Than A Day And Stop Paying For It!
www.knowledgeabout.com/tarot


Psychic RoseR

www.TarotCardReadingsByPsychicRose.com

PO BOX 2471
RONKONKOMA, NY 11779
(631) 331-4860

Madam or Sir:

It has come to my attention that you are using the Google Adwords Campaign
Sponsored link to bid on my Trademark name Psychic Rose.  Please be advised
that this name is in fact a Trademark name and by law you are not permitted
to use it without my express written consent.  Otherwise, your use of the
Trademark name Psychic Rose infringes upon the federal intellectual property
rights of Psychic Rose and your conduct further violates H.R.S. Ch. 481A
which makes it unlawful for a person to engage in unfair and deceptive trade
practices.  Therefore, I request that you Cease and
Desist from using my Trademark name Psychic Rose.   Please cooperate.

By removing the trademark name Psychic Rose and/or psychic rose from the
Google Adwords account, Google network, and content (whatever you are using)
it will automatically remove your ad and stop it.  If you are advertising
under the word  (just) psychic with Google Adwords network and content (see
examples below.)

Please add a negative keyword for psychic rose and that should stop the
problem.  Please cooperate.

I suggest you cooperate and listen to Google?s Notice under the keyword tool
in your adwords account and read carefully:
Important note: Please note that we cannot guarantee that these keywords
will improve your campaign performance. We also reserve the right to
disapprove any new keywords you add. Keep in mind that you alone are
responsible for the keywords you select and for making sure that your use of
the keywords does not violate any applicable laws, including any applicable
trademark laws.
?I represent that the information in this notification is true and correct
and that I am the Trademark owner.?
Any questions, you can contact the Attorney Mr. Edwards who is handling your
case at 631-331-5433.
Respectfully,
Psychic RoseR
Reg. No. 3,013,312

On search sites in the Google Network, your ads could appear along side or
above search results or as a part of a results page a user navigates to
through a site's directory. Our global search network includes Froogle and
Google Groups and the following:

Our extensive content network of high-quality consumer and industry-specific
websites and products, such as newsletters (U.S. only) and email programs,
includes:


Here are examples of what AdWords ads look like on Google's content network.

Psychic RoseR

www.TarotCardReadingsByPsychicRose.com

PO BOX 2471
RONKONKOMA, NY 11779
(631) 331-4860

Psychic RoseR

www.TarotCardReadingsByPsychicRose.com

PO BOX 2471
RONKONKOMA, NY 11779
(631) 331-4860

Madam or Sir:

It has come to my attention that you are using my Trademark name Psychic
Rose.  Please be advised that this name is in fact a Trademark name and by
law you are not permitted to use it without my express written consent.  You
have been using my duly registered mark Psychic Rose and/or psychic rose to
advertise your own services on the Internet.

By law you are not permitted to use it without express written consent from
Psychic Rose.
Otherwise, your use of the Trademark name Psychic Rose infringes upon the
federal intellectual property rights of Psychic Rose and your conduct
further violates H.R.S.
Ch. 481A which makes it
unlawful for a person to engage in unfair and deceptive trade practices.

Accordingly, we must hereby demand on behalf of Psychic Rose that you
immediately cease and desist from using the mark Psychic Rose.  Psychic Rose
is considering taking legal proceedings which means you can be liable for
damages and Attorney fees.

Therefore, I request that you Cease and Desist from using my Trademark
name Psychic Rose.   Please
cooperate.
?I represent that the information in this notification is true and correct
and that I am the Trademark owner.?
Any questions, you can contact the Attorney Mr. Edwards who is handling your
case at 631-331-5433.
Respectfully,
Psychic RoseR
Reg. No. 3,013,312









- --- Phil Forbes <knowledgeabout@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hi Psychic,
> 
> I would like to thank you for visiting my website and I hope the 
> content has been of value to you.
> 
> My name is Phil Forbes and although I am not a professional, I am an 
> authority on tarot, I have been involved in it some way or another for 
> a long time.
> 
> Right now there are 1,039 tarot
> enthusiasts just like you who are reading this newsletter.
> 
> What's really funny is I
> haven?t really gone out and tried to become a ?big shot? in the tarot 
> world... so this underground newsletter must be getting spread around 
> by word of mouth.
> 
> You and I are really part of something special. I?m talking about this 
> underground tarot scene that we?re part of.
> 
> Did you know that an average of 350 tarot enthusiasts just like you 
> are joining us every WEEK?
> 
> It?s true. 
> 
> An average of 50 tarot enthusiasts just like you are joining us EVERY 
> Day!
> 
> In fact, our community ( that you helped
> start) is growing so fast that I?m
> thinking of going even deeper underground? 
> so it doesn?t get too big.
> 
> Anyway, thanks for being here and thanks for your interest in the 
> material from our fellow tarot enthusiast Daniel Brown:
> http://www.bblsi.com/tarot/,
> 
> he brings a complete package,
> It is indeed really special. 
> 
> The reason I say this is because it?s revealing the tarot secrets that 
> the so-called "experts" have been using to their advantage all this 
> time.
> 
> I will talk more about Daniel Brown?s package in the days to come.
> 
> I for one am glad I found out about
> it early!
> 
> For now just go to http://www.bblsi.com/tarot/
> 
> Warm regards,
> 
> Phil
> 
> 
> 
>
